thread.title: U.S. Probes Mexico’s Cemex Over Payments Tied to Colombia Project

author: Robbie Whelan
title: U.S. Probes Mexico’s Cemex Over Payments Tied to Colombia Project
text:
MEXICO CITY—The U.S. Department of Justice is investigating Mexico’s Cemex SAB over payments made by the company related to a cement plant it is building in Colombia to determine whether they violated federal bribery laws.
Cemex, one of the world’s largest cement producers, said in a filing Monday that it had received a federal grand jury subpoena related to the Colombian project, located in the municipality of Maceo. Cemex represents 7.2% of Mexico’s benchmark IPC index.
